choices.A: Machine Learning Classifier Trainer, Language Based Classifier, and Keyword Based Classifier Trainer.
choices.D: Keyword Based Classifier Trainer, Intelligent Keyword Classifier Trainer, and Machine Learning Classifier Trainer.
choices.B: Intelligent Keyword Classifier Trainer, Language Based Classifier Trainer, and Image Based Classifier Trainer.

questions.question_text: What are the three types of classifier trainers available in packages UiPath.lntelligentOCR.Activities and UiPath.Documentunderstanding.MLActivities?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Intelligent Keyword Classifier Trainer
Keyword Based Classifier Trainer
Machine Learning Classifier Trainer
the correct answer is the D

questions.question_text: Which statement accurately describes the utilization of out-of-the-box models in UiPath?

choices.C: Out-of-the-box models are pre-trained models that cover a wide range of document types.
choices.D: Out-of-the-box models are only available for specific languages and cannot be adapted for multilingual documents.
choices.A: Out-of-the-box models require extensive training and customization before they can be used effectively.
choices.B: Out-of-the-box models are custom-built models created specifically for each project.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
We provide a range of pre-trained out-of-the-box models that can process common document types....

Selected Answer: D
Intelligent Keyword Classifier Trainer
 Keyword Based Classifier Trainer
Machine Learning Classifier Trainer

Selected Answer: B
too much Search can bias your model which is something we want to avoid. Add no more than 10 examples per label in this training mode to avoid annotating bias
